name: The Legendary Roll of the Dice
name_original: The Legendary Roll of the Dice
description:
For whatever reason, your small swarm of dice have decided to make the deadly march to find the golden door in the depths of the dice palace. Roll through forests, over sand dunes and between perilous rivers of lava as you avoid the massive rogue dice and the red evil dice.

Clicking or holding the left mouse button will change the target that your swarm is moving towards. More in-depth instructions provided in-game.

Defeat the rogue dice by deflecting enemies with your shield.

Find the golden door and win the game!

All assets made in 48 hours except for the soundtrack, which is simply some music I wrote earlier this year.

Credits:

Kinjaan - programming, art, music and sound effects
